title: HELP ME PLEASE
body: I was in a game and my internet shut down. I have left games in the past and after a while i realized it wasn't just myself i was causing problems for but my whole team too. They got a loss and i got a leaver. But this time my internet went down and i know I've been reported in the past. Is there any way i can check if my acct was ban? Would i even be able to log into the website to discuss this? Im so stressed out because i have a lot of joy in the acct and i don't want to lose it.

replies.body:
No bans for you!! Don't worry about that one game, leaverbusters won't actually ban you. If you end up leaving multiple games you might have to sit through a low-priority queue but you shouldn't be banned. 

Another little tidbit, even if you **were** banned from the game, you'll still be able to access the boards! These profiles are linked, but they are in fact 2 separate profiles.

1. LeaverBuster does not issue bans, only low priority queues.
  * These queues will extent the amount of time it takes for you to get into Champ Select. 

2. Even if you were banned, you would still be able to post on the Boards.
